description.raw:
issue #1820

I believe this only started happening recently after pull request #2078 was merged, mainly due to [this line](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2078/ensure-that-link_frame_visual-arrow/diff#Lgazebo/rendering/Scene.ccT3118) which now deletes all types of child visuals when the parent visual is removed from scene.

I was able to reproduce the problem by doing:

1. Insert box (creates a box visual in scene)

1. right click on box and Edit

1. save and exit (this deletes the old box visual and inserts a new one)

1. edit model again -> crash

The PR contains a temporary fix. A better solution is to fix the whole scene / visual deletion process.

This is a critical bug that causes crashes so I think we should get it in before the gazebo7 release

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/55/) - ok
